tasks.task: Performing organizational and community activities related to agricultural support and technology implementation
subtasks: Participating in discussions about drought relief and coping strategies
Forming water use associations to manage irrigation and resource allocation
Exploring new agricultural technologies such as drip irrigation to enhance water efficiency
Encouraging community engagement and participation in sustainable farming practices
Addressing government incentives and support for farmers affected by climate change

tasks.task: Adapting agricultural methods in response to environmental challenges
subtasks: Implementing water conservation techniques like minimum water usage
Utilizing drip irrigation systems to improve crop resilience during droughts
Sharing knowledge and resources among farmers to promote successful adaptation

tasks.task: Managing community infrastructure and resources for agricultural benefit
subtasks: Developing local distribution networks for food surplus
Coordinating efforts to maintain and protect farmland against external threats
Organizing cooperative approaches to purchasing essential supplies at discounted rates
